amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network by $200,000 and to increase funding for taxpayer services at the IRS by $100,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network by $200,000 and to increase funding for taxpayer services at the IRS by $100,000.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 258 (Roll no. 409).
